data.question: What is the empirical formula of 2D-Co-MOF?
At what temperature was the X-ray data for 2D-Co-MOF collected?
What is the crystal system of 2D-Co-MOF?
What is the space group of 2D-Co-MOF?
What is the final R index for 2D-Co-MOF when I>2σ(I)?
Is the 2D-Co-MOF thermally stable up to 400 ºC?
data.answer: Yes, the 2D-Co-MOF shows thermal stability up to 400 ºC.

data.question: Does the 2D-Co-MOF maintain its structure after treatment with ethanol and acetonitrile?
data.answer: Yes, the 2D-Co-MOF maintains its structure after treatment with ethanol and acetonitrile.

data.question: What is the TOF value of 2D-Co-MOF at an overpotential of 400 mV?
Can the original 3D layered structure of 2D-Co-MOF be restored by a solvothermal process with pyridine?
data.answer: Yes, the original 3D layered structure can be restored by a solvothermal process with pyridine.

data.question: Does the presence of Nafion in the 2D-Co-MOF@Nafion composite preclude the pyridine-water exchange?
data.answer: No, the presence of Nafion does not preclude the pyridine-water exchange.

data.question: What is the effect of increasing the Nafion content in the 2D-Co-MOF@Nafion composite on its electrocatalytic activity?
data.answer: Increasing the Nafion content attenuates the incipient voltammetric features associated with the redox conversion of the cobalt centers and the OER.

data.question: What happens to the electrocatalytic activity of 2D-Co-MOF@Nafion composite after electrochemical activation?
data.answer: The electrocatalytic activity of 2D-Co-MOF@Nafion composite is enhanced after electrochemical activation.

data.question: What is the Faradaic efficiency of 2D-Co-MOF for the OER reaction after extensive water electrolysis?
Does the 2D-Co-MOF@Nafion composite retain its electrocatalytic performance after several on/off reaction cycles?
data.answer: Yes, the 2D-Co-MOF@Nafion composite retains a remarkable electrocatalytic performance after several on/off reaction cycles.

data.question: What is the Tafel slope (TS) value of 2D-Co-MOF?
Is the 2D-Co-MOF@Nafion composite's electrocatalytic activity for water oxidation superior to similar electrocatalysts operating under the same conditions?
data.answer: Yes, the 2D-Co-MOF@Nafion composite exhibits superior electrocatalytic activity for water oxidation compared to similar electrocatalysts.

data.question: What is the overpotential value at 2 mA cm-2 for 2D-Co-MOF?
Does the 2D-Co-MOF@Nafion composite show good adherence to graphite electrodes?
data.answer: Yes, the 2D-Co-MOF@Nafion composite shows good adherence to graphite electrodes.

data.question: What is the role of nitrogen-containing aromatic equatorial ligands in the enhanced electrocatalytic activity of 2D-Co-MOF?
data.answer: The nitrogen-containing aromatic equatorial ligands presumably facilitate the water nucleophilic attack, contributing to the enhanced electrocatalytic activity of 2D-Co-MOF.

data.question: Does the 2D-Co-MOF exhibit a memory effect during the delamination-pillarization process?
data.answer: Yes, the 2D-Co-MOF exhibits a memory effect during the delamination-pillarization process.
